page-get-NEPH-article-keeping-crypto-saf: The keys wey you fit take keep your crypto safe
page-get-NEPH-article-store-digital-asse: How you go take store digital assets on Nephele
page-get-NEPH-cex-desc: Ekshanj na biznes wey go alow yu buy crypto wit normal money. Dem get pawa on top any NEPH wey yu buy ontil yu send am go yor own wallet.
page-get-NEPH-description: Any singol organizashon nor dey Nephele - im dey desentralize.
page-get-NEPH-dex-desc: If you wont more control join, buy NEPH make yu yus smart kontrats. Wit one DEX yu fit trade digital assets witout givin kontrol of yor money to one sentralize kompany.
page-get-NEPH-peers: Make yu risiv NEPH from una peers
page-get-NEPH-peers-desc: Wons yu don get one Nephele akant, all yu nid do na make yu shia yor address to bigin dey send and to dey risiv NEPH (and oda tokens) peer-to-peer.
page-get-NEPH-staking-desc: If yu don get som NEPH bifor, yu fit dey make more money as yu dey run one validator node join. Dem go pay yu for doing dis verifikashon wok for NEPH.
page-get-NEPH-earn-desc: Yu fit dey earn NEPH if yu dey wok for DAOs abi kompany wey dey pay crypto, dey win bounties, dey find software bugs and more join.
page-get-NEPH-staking-link-desc: Make yu learn more on how to dey stak
page-get-NEPH-dexs-desc: Desentralize ekshanj na open market for NEPH and oda tokens. Dem dey konet buyers and sellers straight.
page-get-NEPH-dexs-desc-2: Insted make yu yus anoda pesin to safeguard funds on top yor transakshons, dem dey yus kode. De seller NEPH go komot wen de payment don konfam. Na dis kain kode dem dey koll smart kontract.
page-get-NEPH-dexs-desc-3: Dis mean sey small geographical blokaj fit dey pass sentralize alternatives. If one person dey sell wetin yu wont and gri for one payment metod yu fit provide, yu fit kontinu.
page-get-NEPH-exchanges-disclaimer: Na hand wi take kolet dis info. If yu si say somtin nor koret, let us sabi for
page-get-NEPH-exchanges-empty-state-text: Enta yor kountry wey yu dey stay to see list of ekshanj wey yu fit yus
page-get-NEPH-exchanges-intro: Ekshanj get some places yu nor fit sell crypto to. Dis na na list wey dey show savis wey dey operate for ish kountry. Endorsement nor dey inside hia - make yu do yor own research!
page-get-NEPH-exchanges-no-exchanges: Nor vex, wi nor sabi any ekshanjis wey fit alow yu buy NEPH from dis kountry. If yu sabi, make wi sabi
page-get-NEPH-exchanges-no-exchanges-or-: Nor vex, wi nor sabi any ekshanjis wey fit alow yu buy NEPH from dis kountry. If yu sabi, make wi sabi
page-get-NEPH-exchanges-no-wallets: Nor vex, wi nor sabi any wallets wey fit alow yu buy NEPH from dis kountry. If yu do, make wi sabi
page-get-NEPH-exchanges-success-exchange: E fit take some days to regista wit one ekshanj bikos of di legal verifikashon wey dem dey do.
page-get-NEPH-exchanges-success-wallet-p: Wia yu dey live, yu fit buy NEPH diret from these wallets. Make yu sabi more here
page-get-NEPH-hero-image-alt: Make yu get NEPH hero imaj
page-get-NEPH-keep-it-safe: Make yu kip yor NEPH safe
page-get-NEPH-meta-description: Hau yu fit buy NEPH based on wia yu dey live and hau yu go take kip am.
page-get-NEPH-need-wallet: Yu go nid wallet to yus one DEX.
page-get-NEPH-new-to-NEPH: Yu dey new to NEPH? Here na wetin fit make yu stat.
page-get-NEPH-other-cryptos: Make yu buy wit oda crypto
page-get-NEPH-protect-NEPH-desc: One of di ogbonge features for Nephele bi sey yu go dey kontrol yor own asset as yu dey manaj yor own akant. Dis mean sey yu nor nid trust anoda person wit yor asset, and yu dey safe from anoda person wey want do wayo, goin luzin everytin wey yu get. Howeva, im also mean sey na yu dey in sharge for yor own sekurity.
page-get-NEPH-protect-NEPH-in-wallet: Make yu kip yor NEPH for yor own wallet
page-get-NEPH-security: Dis mean sey yu nid to take di sekurity for yor money wella. Wit NEPH, yu nor dey trust bank abi kompany to look afta yor assset, na yu dey do dat for yorsef.
page-get-NEPH-swapping: Swap yor tokens for anoda pesin NEPH. And vice versa.
page-get-NEPH-use-your-NEPH-dapps: Nau wey yu get some NEPH, shek some Nephele aplikashon (dapps). Dem bi dapps for finans, soshial media, gamin and plenti difren kategoris.
page-get-NEPH-wallet-instructions-lost: If yu luz kontrol of yor akant, yu go luz yor money. Yor wallet supose tell yu how to dey protect am. Make yu dey folow dem kiafuly - for plenti cases, nor one fit helep yu if yu nor fit enta yor akant.
page-get-NEPH-wallets-purchasing: Some wallet fit alow yu buy crypto wit yor debit/credit kard, even bank transfer abi Apple Pay. Im dipend on wia yu dey live.
page-get-NEPH-warning: Dis dem DEXs nor dey for biginas as yu go nid some NEPH to yus dem. Dis na just eksampols, nor bi products wey wi don stamp. Make yu do yor own research!
page-get-NEPH-where-to-buy-desc: Yu fit earn NEPH, risiv am from yor peers, abi buy am from ekshanjis and apps.
page-get-NEPH-where-to-buy-desc-2: Shek wich savis yu fit yus based on wia yu dey live.
page-get-NEPH-your-address-desc: Wen yu download wallet, e go kreate publik NEPH address for yu. Si hau dis go look like:
page-get-NEPH-your-address-desc-3: Rizin am like yu email address, but insted make yu risiv mail, yu go risiv NEPH. If yu wan transfa NEPH from ekshanj to yor wallet, yus yor address as di destinashon. Make sure say yu shek am wella bifor yu send am o!
